title: Ozanari Dungeon: Kaze no Tou
alternative_title: Ozanari Dungeon, おざなりダンジョン 風の塔
description: The king of the Tower of Wind seeks the power of the legendary Dragon's Head, and employs the fighter Moka, the thief Buruman, and the magic user Kiriman to steal it for him. But the Dragon's Head is sealed in the Temple of Fire, and to capture it Moka will have to face the sect that has protected it generation after generation!
